de.prototypefund.utils

Class ResourceUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.prototypefund.utils.ResourceUtilities

  • public final class ResourceUtilities
extends Object
    Test utility class providing resources for the test in- and output

    • Method Detail

      • getAbsolutePath

        public static String getAbsolutePath(String relativeFilePath)
                              throws FileNotFoundException
        The relative path of the test file will be resolved and the absolute will be returned
        Parameters:
        relativeFilePath - Path of the test resource relative to src/test/resource/.
        Returns:
        the absolute path of the test file
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - If the file could not be found

      • getURI

        public static URI getURI(String relativeFilePath)
                  throws URISyntaxException
        The relative path of the test file will be resolved and the absolute will be returned
        Parameters:
        relativeFilePath - Path of the test resource relative to src/test/resource/.
        Returns:
        the URI created based on the relativeFilePath
        Throws:
        URISyntaxException - if no URI could be created from the given relative path

      • getTestOutput

        public static String getTestOutput(String relativeFilePath)
                            throws IOException
        The relative path of the test file will be used to determine an absolute path to a temporary directory in the output directory.
        Parameters:
        relativeFilePath - Path of the test resource relative to src/test/resource/.
        Returns:
        absolute path to a test output
        Throws:
        IOException - if no absolute Path could be created.

      • getTestResourceAsStream

        public static InputStream getTestResourceAsStream(String relativeFilePath)
        The Input of the test file will be resolved and the absolute will be returned
        Parameters:
        relativeFilePath - Path of the test resource relative to src/test/resource/.
        Returns:
        the absolute path of the test file

      • newTestOutputFile

        public static File newTestOutputFile(String relativeFilePath)
        Relative to the test output directory (ie. "target/test-classes") a test file will be returned dependent on the relativeFilePath provided.
        Parameters:
        relativeFilePath - Path of the test output resource relative to target/test-classes/.
        Returns:
        the empty File of the test output (to be filled)

      • getReferenceFile

        public static File getReferenceFile(String relativeFilePath)
        Relative to the test input directory (ie. "src/test/resources") a test file will be returned dependent on the relativeFilePath provided.
        Parameters:
        relativeFilePath - Path of the test output resource relative to target/test-classes/.
        Returns:
        the empty File of the test output (to be filled)

      • getTestOutputFolder

        public static String getTestOutputFolder()
        Returns:
        the absolute path of the test output folder, which is usually target/test-classes/.

      • getTestReferenceFolder

        public static File getTestReferenceFolder()
        Returns:
        the File of the reference input directory, usually "src/test/resources"

      • saveStringToFile

        public static String saveStringToFile(File file,
                                      String data)

      • saveStringToFile

        public static String saveStringToFile(File file,
                                      Charset charset,
                                      String inputData)
        Parameters:
        file - the file to be saved, when creating a test file, you might use newTestOutputFile(String relativeFilePath).
        charset - the character encoding
        inputData - the data to be written into the file
        Returns:
        absolute file path of new output file

      • loadFileAsString

        public static String loadFileAsString(File file)
        Parameters:
        file - the file to be loaded, when accessing a test file, you might use newTestOutputFile(String relativeFilePath).
        Returns:
        the data from the given file as a String

      • loadFileAsBytes

        public static byte[] loadFileAsBytes(File file)
                              throws IOException
        Parameters:
        file - the file to be loaded, when accessing a test file, you might use newTestOutputFile(String relativeFilePath).
        Returns:
        the data from the given file as a byte array
        Throws:
        IOException

      • encodeInAscii

        public static String encodeInAscii(String encodedString)
        Returns the JSONObject as String with all characters over 127 encoded as escaped unicode, e.g. as "«"

      • newRefOutputFile

        public static File newRefOutputFile(File targetFolder,
                                    String relativeFilePath)
        Relative to the test output directory (ie. "target/test-classes") a test file will be returned dependent on the relativeFilePath provided.
        Parameters:
        targetFolder -
        relativeFilePath - Path of the test output resource relative to target/test-classes/.
        Returns:
        the empty File of the test output (to be filled)

      • xmlSingleQuotedEscape

        public static String xmlSingleQuotedEscape(String s)
        Escape a string for use inside as XML single-quoted attributes. This escapes less-than, single-quote, ampersand, and (not strictly necessary) newlines.
